jhelp.gui.twoD

Interface FoldingAreaInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FoldingAreaSimple, FoldingAreaTitle

    public interface FoldingAreaInterface
    Describe how draw folding panel JHelpFoldable2D header
    Author:
    JHelp

        Draw the header

        x - X location

        width - Width
        height - Height
        parent - Image where draw
        fold - Indicates if the panel is fold or not
